Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory546.jpg'}
{3: "You finish today's plans early and check where your squad members are on your terminal."}
{3: 'A little red dot for Lucia is still at the "Holographic Experience Hall".'}
{3: "Lucia wouldn't usually come here alone. What's she up to?"}
{2: "(Let's check it out)", 3: '8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: "After showing your ID and following the staff, you open the big white wooden door. You're hit with a salty, wet breeze, just like the ocean."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory533.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory533.jpg'}
{3: 'A vast sky stretches overhead, pristine blue as if freshly washed. Waves roll ceaselessly along the horizon—the scene before your eyes is indistinguishable from a real coastline.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Maybe a bit more to the left would look better?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The black sand underfoot feels real. In the distance, Lucia stands with her back to you, hands behind her, looking up and talking to herself.'}
{2: 'Lucia.', 3: '22', 4: "(Move closer to see what she's doing)", 5: '22'}
{3: 'Noticing you, Lucia turns around suddenly, her red eyes filled with surprise and delight.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Wait... didn't you say you had a mission today?", 4: '1'}
{2: "It wasn't that important, so I decided to take the day off.", 3: '30', 4: 'The mission was easy, so we finished early.', 5: '30'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Got it. Next time there's an easy mission like that, let me handle it. You've been up late lately—you need to take care of yourself.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As you smile back at Lucia, you hear a familiar metallic sound from above. You look up and see her CUB, Corvus.'}
{3: 'The bird-shaped CUB flies around and then drops a few little metal balls.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleYanhuan02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleYanhuan02.prefab'}
{3: 'The little sphere drops through the air, pops open, and shoots out colorful lights. They burst across the sky, blending with the bright afternoon sun.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm... getting the holographic fireworks ready.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's your birthday, after all. I was planning a big surprise for this evening.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just you thinking of me is enough.', 3: '51'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yeah, I have a birthday gift for you too. I'll give it to you later.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia smiles gently as she looks at you, the sea breeze lifting her hair.'}
{2: 'This place looks unbelievably real.', 3: '55'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant, come on over. There's even more cool stuff to see.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia takes your arm, and you both walk toward the ocean.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Vehicle Request: Boat.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia waves her index finger in the air. Blob-like things appear, growing and shrinking until they turn into a small boat.'}
{2: 'Are we going out to sea?', 3: '66'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I was going to show them later, but since you're here, let's start now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Please sit and hold on tight, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory537.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory537.jpg'}
{3: 'Lucia sits next to you at the back of the boat, waves her hand over the side, and the coast starts to fade away.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "This is all a copy of Earth's scenery before the Punishing. Seeing these untouched oceans brings me peace.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll do the same.", 3: '81', 4: 'Does the time here match Babylonia?', 5: '79'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yeah, this place is still in testing. They haven't put in the manual sunlight control yet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "If we get the chance, let's rent a boat and see more cool places, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yes, definitely.', 3: '84'}
{3: 'The two of them sit next to each other on the boat, talking about everyday things, like they always do.'}
{3: 'As they chat, the land completely vanishes behind them, and the little boat floats aimlessly on the vast blue water.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory783.jpg'}
{3: "Before you know it, it's twilight. The setting sun's already painted the ocean gold."}
{3: "Lucia looks at the blue and gold sky, slowly letting go of the hand she'd been holding."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, could you close your eyes and wait a second?', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'As Lucia asks, you lean back and close your eyes. In the dark, the metal gliding sound from the sky becomes remarkably clear.'}
{3: 'A moment later, you hear light footsteps and the sound of waves. They come closer and stop right in front of you, and you smell something sweet.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You can open your eyes now, Commandant.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory783.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You see a small, beautiful chocolate cake. The white frosting looks like snow, with your name in jam and almonds on top.'}
{3: 'Lucia slowly holds out her hand, and with a soft snap, a little flame comes from her fingertip, lighting all the candles and lighting up her face.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I asked the World Government Association of Art to make a special birthday cake for you, designed just how I wanted it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Happy birthday, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thank you, Lucia.', 3: '118'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Actually, tonight... I have a special favor to ask.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yeah, I want to borrow a wish from you—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia sits back down next to you, like she always does, her shoulder touching yours.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I wish for my Commandant to be safe and happy every day from now on.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I hope I can be with you every year at this time, like today, seeing more beautiful places and making new wishes together.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A familiar warmth spreads across the back of your hand as Lucia looks at you, her ruby eyes reflecting your image.'}
{2: 'Your wish is definitely going to come true.', 3: '133'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Alright then... Commandant, let's blow out the candles together.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With the ocean and candles watching, you hold hands, make a wish together, and simultaneously breathe warm air onto the candle flame.'}
